item.title: About Me
item.description: I like to write, and code, and write about coding.

item.title: Published Articles
item.description: Let’s Learn About Systemd Units # Lastly, since I know you were wondering what happens if you run sudo kill -9 1, I can tell you that on an Ubuntu EC2 machine, it does not trigger kernel panic or cause an explosive fire at Amazon, which is a bummer. Nix Turns 20. What the Hell Is It? # I spoke with a wide range of Nix users, from consultants, to hobbyists, to devs using Nix in production, and even a Nix contributor.
